description:
•	After the released the successful fitness appz like Pushups, Sqauts, and now we come up with an entertainment app is “IA TV Guide”.
•	Are you felling “I am missing the TV programs” or “I don’t know the TV schedule” or “I didn’t remember the next important programs?” then this app for you.
•	By using this app you can view “Current showing”, “Countdown list”, “List of shows” and “Search”.
•	This app also will allow you to view the complete information (like show name, started date, current status, run time, network, air time, classification as well as the list of the episodes list) about the show.
•	IA TV Guide will search your keyword in a large online database.
•	You can view the TV program information from the categorized by letter.
•	This app will allow you to share the TV programs information through mail.
•	User-friendly user interface.
